gore_groups.description: Contains all gore groups for the entity.

overkill_gib_effect.description: Played when this entity is overkilled. We removed the unit and play this effect.

default_force_hollywood_factor.description: The multiplier on the force that we apply on hit bodies that isn't part of any Gore Group.

gib_on_high_velocity_impact.description: Should this entity gib if we impact at high velocity.

drop_mounts_on_dead_gib.description: [bool]If set, we drop all mounted things when we gib any actor and are dead.
